name: The Rise Of Toasty
description:
Welcome to Toasty the Snowman! You play as our friendly neighborhood snowman Toasty with the goal of turning your glutenous enemies to perfect toast! Use WASD or arrow keys to move and tap space to dash in the air. Press M to shoot toasty fireballs but take care! You don't want to burn the toast so make sure you're not spamming your shots. Keep on the lookout for tasty health boosts on your way to the final boss. Best of luck and enjoy!

Credits:

Programming - Ryan, Daniel, Edmond, Anvi, Clea

Art - Clea, Angela

Music/Sound Design - Salma
